```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Importing data using the fread function of the data.table package
FinnGen <- fread("summary_stats_finngen_R10_L12_ATOPIC.tsv")
```

```{r}
FinnGen_sorted <- FinnGen[order(FinnGen$beta,decreasing = T), ]
head(FinnGen_sorted, 20)
```

```{r}
FinnGen_head <- head(FinnGen_sorted, 20)
write.xlsx(FinnGen_head, "FinnGen_head.xlsx")
```

```{r}
head(FinnGen)
```

```{r}
# Scatterplotting with ggplot2
FinnGen_p <- ggplot(FinnGen, aes(x = af_alt, y = beta)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, col = "#5B79FB") +
  labs(title = "Allele Frequency vs. Effect Estimate for FinnGen",
       x = "Allele Frequency",
       y = "Effect Estimate") +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave("Allele Frequency vs. Effect Estimate for FinnGen.png", FinnGen_p, width = 10, height = 8)
```
